name: Fall Apartment
description:
This game tells the story about a girl and a important moment in her life, as she walks into adult life and experiences a colorful and light, but troubled romance.

The story is told as a first person narrative style, in which the scenario can change as the narrator describes the events, where the player can also influence the changes by collecting feelings.

By

Michelle Faifer @micfaifer
Emmanuel Santana @flyingvelvetlob

For the web version, see in here

https://chief-executive-officer-walrus-37141.netlify.com
